description.narrative: The installation of an Intelligent Traffic System infrastructure will contribute to the City''s efforts to create a more efficient road transportation system in Izmir, reducing travel times and fostering higher productivity and economic growth. Moreover, there will be a number of environmental and social benefits due to reduced air pollution, traffic accidents, noise and congestion in the City center. In addition, strengthening its fleet of fire trucks and other emergency vehicles will enable the City to provide a more effective response to its citizens in case of emergencies.

The proposed Project aims to support the investment plan of the Metropolitan Municipality of Izmir (the "City"), focusing specifically on the following two Project components: 1. Traffic management system, including the construction of a new traffic control center and the installation of an intelligent traffic signal system to replace the current outmoded and unconnected signal controllers, thereby reducing the congestion of the urban road network. 2. Emergency response vehicles: a substantial part of the loan proceeds will be used for strengthening the Citys fleet of fire trucks and other emergency response vehicles to meet the needs of a growing city and provide a more effective response to its citizens.
